actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code in order to provide that partial disability and death pensions be paid in the case of persons whose annual income exceeds the annual income limitations by an amount not in excess of the minimum amount of pension payable in 1 year.

summary.text: Provides that partial disability and death pensions in specified amounts be paid in the case of veterans whose annual income exceeds the annual income limitation by an amount not in excess of the minimum amount of pension payable in one year. (Amends 38 U.S.C. 521 (b)

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code in order to provide that partial disability and death pensions be paid in the case of persons whose annual income exceeds the annual income limitations by an amount not in excess of the minimum amount of pension payable in 1 year.
